thread.title: Win a £350 holiday voucher

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a £350 holiday voucher
text: As we remember the bombing of Nagasaki, share your memories of other war memorials – the Menin Gate at Ypres, perhaps, or the Jewish Museum in Berlin. The reader who sends in the best entry will win a £350 travel voucher. DialAFlight DialAFlight (0844 556 6060; dialaflight.com ) is one of Britain’s top travel companies, offering tailor-made travel to destinations worldwide. Whether you are looking to fly to the Caribbean, long for a round-the-world adventure or are simply seeking a short break, DialAFlight’s 300-strong team can assist. No itinerary is too big or too complicated and DialAFlight prides itself on offering some of the best-priced air fares in the industry. It also offers deals on hotels, escorted tours and car hire. The prize Win a £350 voucher to spend on a holiday with DialAFlight. Choose from a range of trips and flights to destinations including Africa, Asia, Canada, the Caribbean, New Zealand, Australia, India and the US. Save 15 per cent on an autumn break to Crete and stay in style at the five-star Domes Of Elounda hotel . Set on a private stretch of beach, the hotel is surrounded by olive groves and overlooks Mirabello Bay. Seven nights’ half-board cost from £689 per person (two sharing) including flights (Gatwick). Valid for departures October 1 to 24 2015. Looking for a romantic escape? Save £800 per couple at Mexico’s five-star Secrets Playa Mujeres Resort & Spa . This adults-only, all-suite resort on a white-sand beach has a spa, infinity pool and lots of dining options. Seven nights’ all-inclusive in a swim-out Junior Suite costs from £1,245 per person (two sharing) including flights (Gatwick). Valid for departures November 1 to December 8 2015. Submissions Email your entries (no more than 150 words, please) with your name, address and telephone number, by midnight on Wednesday August 12 2015, to yoursay@telegraph.co.uk. The £350 DialAFlight voucher can be used for travel departing within a year of the competition date, subject to availability. It is redeemable against one booking only (international travel only), made within six months of the competition date. The prize is non-transferable and no cash alternative is available. Only one prize voucher can be won per person per year. All bookings are subject to DialAFlight’s booking terms and conditions (see dialaflight.com ). Other terms and conditions apply. Email yoursay@telegraph.co.uk for details. Telegraphtravel Follow @telegraphtravel
